hero.title: Capture 95% of sales on Kaspi.kz
hero.subtitle: Our service is an automatic price reduction bot. It checks competitors every 3 minutes and sets your price 1 tenge lower, so you're always first in the seller list. No human intervention, 24/7.

problem.title: Market reality
problem.subtitle: The one who understands the rules wins.

items.title: 2nd place = 0 sales
items.description: Buyers almost never open the full seller list. 95% of orders go to whoever is first and visible on the main button. Being second means being invisible.

items.title: Speed beats price dumping
items.description: You don't need to set the lowest price all day and lose margin. Just be 1 tenge cheaper than competitors at the exact moment the customer visits.

items.title: War of algorithms
items.description: Your competitors have already automated their processes. Trying to outrun a bot manually by constantly refreshing the page is like racing a car on foot.

items.title: Every minute = lost customer
items.description: While you sleep, have breakfast, or are busy with other things — competitors are capturing your buyers. The market doesn't wait, it works 24/7.

items.title: Manual management kills profit
items.description: Constant price monitoring and manual changes are not just a waste of time, but inevitable mistakes that cost you real money.

items.title: Invisibility = marketplace failure
items.description: If you're not in the top of Kaspi search results at the moment of search — you simply don't exist for the buyer. The algorithm is harsh and impartial.

solution.title: How to get started?
solution.subtitle: Setup takes 2 minutes. You don't need to install any software — everything works through the browser.

step1.title: Connection
step1.description: Register on the site and add your Kaspi store. Products are loaded automatically in a couple of minutes.

step2.title: Setup
step2.description: Set the "Minimum price" — the threshold below which the bot won't go. This protects you from selling at a loss.

step3.title: Autopilot enabled
step3.description: Activate the bot. Now it monitors competitors 24/7 and changes prices so you're always in first place.

howItWorks.title: Decision-making algorithm
howItWorks.subtitle: The service doesn't just change numbers, it analyzes the situation.

items.question: Why do you need my Kaspi login and password?
items.answer: For the bot to change prices, it must authorize as a manager. This is safe: we don't ask for access to bank accounts or digital signatures. You can create a separate "Electronic Manager" with limited rights.

items.question: Is this legal? Will I get blocked?
items.answer: This is absolutely legal. The bot does the same thing as a human, just faster. We don't hack the Kaspi site, we work through the official seller dashboard.

items.question: What if a competitor also uses a bot?
items.answer: You set a minimum price (cost price) below which you can't go. The bot will lower the price to this threshold. If a competitor goes lower — the bot will stop.

items.question: Can I manage multiple stores?
items.answer: Yes, you can add multiple stores in one TopPrice account.

items.question: How often are prices updated?
items.answer: Standard speed is checking every 3 minutes. This is enough to stay ahead of 99% of competitors.

items.question: How can I try it for free?
items.answer: We give 3 days of free access to all features. No card required. Just register and test.
